name: Hungry Harold AR
description:
Hungry Harold 

This is a trial at AR with the resources that i had to make a game for kids that would teach them things they should try avoid like junk-food and uncooked food. This is the first version at the moment as i get access to better phones and optimization options i hope it will run better. 

I know that i made this game for kids but understand that this is a game where a programmer is just trying to mess around with AR tools that he had .
